channel.title: Help with mysql
channel.description: i would like to use mysql with my server to store playes. idk how and i now there are servers that use mysql. and also i was wondering if there if a server side script that can execute a rsps?php,jsp?

[/quote]ok thx
You can’t host servers on a free host, you need shell access and 128mb+ ram allocated to your account.[/quote]

item.title: Help with mysql
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

xryz:

if there if a server side script that can execute a rsps?php,jsp?

JSP- I think so.
PHP- If it is your computer or if you have a Dedicated server/VPS, then you should be able to use PHP’s exec() function to execute a command box-side.

MySQL with server - read up on JDBC.

Read full topic
